statements: SELECT * FROM GamingAccessories;
SELECT accessory_name, price, quantity_in_stock FROM GamingAccessories WHERE product_type = 'Keyboard';
SELECT accessory_name, price FROM GamingAccessories WHERE price >= 50;
SELECT accessory_name, quantity_in_stock FROM GamingAccessories WHERE supplier_id = 101 ORDER BY quantity_in_stock DESC;
SELECT * FROM GamingAccessories ORDER BY price ASC, quantity_in_stock DESC;
SELECT * FROM GamingAccessories WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY accessory_name DESC;
SELECT accessory_name, price FROM GamingAccessories WHERE quantity_in_stock > 0 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT accessory_name, product_type, supplier_id FROM GamingAccessories WHERE supplier_id = 1 OR supplier_id = 2;
SELECT accessory_name, quantity_in_stock FROM GamingAccessories WHERE product_type = 'Keyboard' AND quantity_in_stock < 10;
SELECT MAX(price) AS highest_price, MIN(price) AS lowest_price, AVG(price) AS average_price FROM GamingAccessories;
SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT accessory_name, sale_amount FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_amount DESC;
SELECT accessory_name, sale_date FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 1000;
SELECT accessory_name, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM accessory_trends ORDER BY trend_start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 500 ORDER BY sale_date DESC
SELECT accessory_name, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' AND sale_amount < 1000 ORDER BY sale_amount ASC
SELECT accessory_name, trend_description FROM accessory_trends WHERE trend_start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY trend_end_date DESC
SELECT sale_amount, accessory_name FROM sales_data WHERE accessory_name = 'Phone Case' AND sale_date > '2022-03-01' ORDER BY sale_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM accessory_trends WHERE trend_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY trend_start_date ASC
SELECT accessory_name, category, price FROM gaming_accessories;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date = '2021-10-15';
SELECT trend_date, category, total_sales FROM trends_data ORDER BY trend_date DESC;
SELECT accessory_name, quantity FROM gaming_accessories WHERE category = 'Keyboards';
SELECT SUM(quantity_sold) AS total_sold, AVG(total_price) AS average_price FROM sales_data;
SELECT accessory_name, category, price FROM gaming_accessories WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT accessory_name, total_price FROM gaming_accessories JOIN sales_data ON gaming_accessories.accessory_id = sales_data.accessory_id WHERE total_price > 100;

SELECT accessory_name, quantity_sold, total_price FROM gaming_accessories JOIN sales_data ON gaming_accessories.accessory_id = sales_data.accessory_id WHERE quantity_sold > 5 ORDER BY total_price DESC;
SELECT trend_date, category, total_sales FROM trends_data WHERE total_sales >= 5000 ORDER BY trend_date ASC;
SELECT accessory_name, price, quantity FROM gaming_accessories WHERE category = 'Headsets';
SELECT * FROM gaming_accessories;
SELECT accessory_name, price FROM gaming_accessories WHERE manufacturer='Example Corp';
SELECT accessory_name, MAX(price) AS max_price FROM gaming_accessories GROUP BY accessory_name;
SELECT accessory_name, manufacturer, price FROM gaming_accessories ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_records WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM gaming_accessories ORDER BY accessory_name DESC;
SELECT accessory_name, price FROM gaming_accessories WHERE manufacturer='ABC Inc';
SELECT accessory_name, total_amount FROM gaming_accessories JOIN sales_records ON gaming_accessories.accessory_id = sales_records.accessory_id WHERE sales_records.quantity > 10;
SELECT accessory_name, price, manufacturer FROM gaming_accessories WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT manufacturer, COUNT(*) AS total_sales FROM gaming_accessories JOIN sales_records ON gaming_accessories.accessory_id = sales_records.accessory_id GROUP BY manufacturer;
SELECT * FROM accessories;
SELECT accessory_name, category, price FROM accessories WHERE stock_quantity > 0;
SELECT accessory_name, price FROM accessories WHERE category = 'earphones';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 100 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM accessories WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY accessory_name DESC
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%'
SELECT order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount < 1000 ORDER BY order_date ASC
SELECT accessory_name, category, price FROM accessories WHERE stock_quantity > 0 AND category = 'Electronics'
SELECT customer_name, address, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 500)
